named-query.name: BC_READ_SEARCH_URL
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.search.redirect.domain.SearchRedirect page WHERE upper(page.searchTerm) = upper(:searchTerm) and (page.activeStartDate is null or page.activeStartDate <= :now) and (page.activeEndDate is null or :now <= page.activeEndDate ) order by page.searchPriority
